translation.en: [Bea] Jessie?
-Jess, are you okay? Easy. -[Jessie whimpering]
You're just having a dream.
[panting] There was this thing, like a dark thing,
and it was coming at me.
It's just a dream.
Am I losing it, Bea?
-You think I'm losing it, don't you? -No, I don't think that.
translation.ko: - 미쳤다고 생각하지? - 그렇게 생각 안 해

translation.en: Honestly.
-Just go back to sleep. Yeah? -[panting]
It's okay.
[Jessie] Bea.
Bea, wake up. Bea.
Bea, wake up.
Happy birthday!
Wow, you're so close to me.
[Bea] Do you want some tea?
What are you doing?
[Jessie] I got you a birthday present.
I know you said money was tight this year, but I couldn't resist.
translation.ko: 올해는 절약해야 한댔지만 꼭 주고 싶어서

translation.en: Ah, look, I'm 17 now.
Maybe we don't need to do the invisible present thing.
translation.ko: 투명 선물 놀이는 그만해도 되지 않을까?

translation.en: What invisible present thing?
Okay. Fine.
What is it?
Well, it's pretty obvious to everyone you're desperate to find a boyfriend.
translation.ko: 남자친구 사귀고 싶어서 안달 난 게 빤히 보이길래

translation.en: -I don't want to find a boyfriend. -It's French perfume.
Just two sprays, make any man want to make sweet love to you. Ugh.
translation.ko: 두 번만 칙칙 뿌리면 누구든 홀딱 반할 거야

translation.en: -Almost too sweet, if anything. -Look, I don't…
I am not desperate for a boyfriend, I just…
translation.ko: 안달 난 적 없어, 난 그럴…

translation.en: -I just don't have time for men. -[laughing] My God, Bea!
translation.ko: - 그럴 시간도 없고 - 말도 안 돼

translation.en: You're 17 now. You should be knee-deep in shenanigans at your age.
translation.ko: 이제 17살이잖아 연애질에 푹 빠져 있을 나이라고

translation.en: Ankle-deep at least.
Where's the shenanigans? I don't see any shenanigans.
translation.ko: 근데 언니는 연애질이고 뭐고 기미도 안 보이네

translation.en: Look, stop saying "shenanigans." Oh, my God!
It's my birthday, and I'm banning the word "shenanigans."
That's what I want for my present.
Well, you're not keeping the perfume as well.
[Bea] Wait a minute.
Where's Billy and Spike?
Billy, we shouldn't be here, mate.
translation.ko: 빌리, 우리가 있을 데가 아닌 것 같아

translation.en: I'm too pretty to be here.
I stand out a mile. My handsomeness is making me a target.
Just don't make eye contact with anyone.
translation.ko: 딴 사람이랑 눈만 안 마주치면 돼

translation.en: Why would you say that?
Now I'm just staring at people. I can't not make eye contact.
translation.ko: 그 말 들으니까 더 눈 마주치게 되잖아

translation.en: Yeah! Yes!
Billy.
Billy, let's just go.
William Chisup versus Tam Bibby!
-[man] Yeah, go on then, take it. -On him!
Billy.
I think you should turn around.
Spike!
Just relax, would ya?
I've seen him.
I don't care how big he…
Shit.
-[man] Catch it! -[all cheering]
A gift from the Marquess of Bath, Your Highness.
Happy birthday, sir.
Cups.
I'm so glad that word of my fondness for crockery
has reached the ears of His Lordship.
Daimler… [sighs] I've decided what I'd like for my birthday from my mother.
translation.ko: 데임러, 어머님께 선물로 받고 싶은 걸 정했어

translation.en: I wish to leave the palace.
I'm afraid Her Majesty won't allow that, sir.
After you went over on your ankle,
Dr. Clark advised that you move around as little as possible.
translation.ko: 클라크 박사가 되도록 움직이지 마시라고 했잖습니까

translation.en: Make sure there's no lasting damage.
Tell my mother that I wish…
that I need to leave the palace.
Just for one day.
It is my birthday and that is all I wish for.
When I asked to leave the palace, I meant that I wanted to see the city.
translation.ko: 내 말은 시내를 보고 싶단 얘기였는데

translation.en: The city is a hard place, sir.
It's not for those of a…
delicate constitution.
You know, I could've taken him.
Billy, that guy could do shits bigger than you.
translation.ko: 빌리, 그 남자 똥이 너보다 크겠다

translation.en: -You promised me no more fighting. -I never promised you anything.
translation.ko: - 이제 안 싸운다고 약속했잖아 - 약속한 적 없거든

translation.en: Put a shirt on!
-Why? -Because…
you'll catch a cold, and when you have a cold
translation.ko: 감기 걸릴까 봐 게다가 넌 감기 걸리면

translation.en: you're even more of a bellend.
It's not like I was doing it for myself, is it?
She's always been… unusual, Bea,
but this is something else.
She needs help. And doctors cost money.
translation.ko: 도움이 필요해 병원 가려면 돈이 있어야 하고

translation.en: Hudson cornered me yesterday. We're two months late for the rent.
translation.ko: 어제 허드슨한테도 붙잡혔어 월세 두 달 밀렸다던데

translation.en: If we don't get the money together pronto, we're out.
It's nearly winter. We'd freeze to death.
Look, I know we don't like to talk about it,
translation.ko: 저기, 이 얘기는 하기 싫어하는 거 아는데

translation.en: but what about a workhouse?
What did you say?
I was just trying to find ways--
Don't talk to me about the workhouse, Spike.
You don't know about the workhouse. You weren't there like the rest of us.
translation.ko: 넌 거기가 어떤지 몰라 우리처럼 거기서 지낸 적 없으니까

translation.en: Bea.
Come on, Bea.
We've been through worse than this.
It's like you said, we survived the workhouse, for God's sake.
translation.ko: 네 말마따나 우린 그 구빈원에서도 살아남았어

translation.en: Hmm. Remember when we lived with that eel lady?
translation.ko: 그 장어 아줌마랑 같이 살았을 때 기억나?

translation.en: No one should ever have to live within three feet of an eel.
translation.ko: 장어는 인간이랑 같이 살면 안 되는 생물이야

translation.en: [Spike] I still dream about it.
I dream that I'm in a bath, and one of her eels are in there with me.
translation.ko: 목욕을 하고 있는데 욕조에 장어가 있는 거야

translation.en: -All of a sudden, it just finds its way-- -Yeah, all right, mate. We get it.
translation.ko: - 근데 그게 갑자기 내… - 그만해도 돼, 알아들었어

translation.en: Look, Spike's point is we got through it.
translation.ko: 아무튼, 스파이크 말은 우린 거기서도 버텼단 거야

translation.en: I can't lose her.
She's the only family I've got.
Well, she's not the only family you got.
We're your family, too, aren't we?
Come on.
[sighs] Okay.
So, how do we get some money?
Guys, she's gone.
-[Jessie] You knew it made monsters… -[Dr. Watson] Something's come to London.
translation.ko: - 그게 괴물을 만들었어 - 런던에 뭔가가 왔어

translation.en: [Daimler] This is his time.
[Dr. Watson] Something has come to London, girl.A darkness has entered this city.
translation.ko: 런던에 뭔가가 왔어 이 도시에 어둠이 들어왔다

translation.en: -[Bea] Jess! -[gasps]
Where is it? The dark thing? Is it gone?
translation.ko: 그 시커먼 건 어디 갔어? 사라졌어?

translation.en: [Daimler] What on earth were you doing standing in the road, girl?
translation.ko: 길 한가운데 멍하니 서 있으면 어떡해?

translation.en: I should have you flogged.
Never mind that. What were you doing going so fast? You could've killed her.
translation.ko: 그건 됐고, 마차가 빨랐잖아 누구 치어 죽이려고 환장했어?

translation.en: Young lady, how dare you speak to your betters in that manner.
translation.ko: 아가씨, 윗분들한테 그런 식으로 말하면 안 되지

translation.en: -My betters? -[Daimler] Hmm.
-My betters? -[Spike] Tell him!
[Bea] Just because you ride around in a fancy carriage and wear suits
doesn't make you my better. Doesn't make you anyone's better.
translation.ko: 내 윗분은 아니지 누구 윗분도 아니야

translation.en: -[Daimler] Now, listen here-- -No, you listen here, you prick!
translation.ko: - 내 말 잘 들어 - 댁이나 잘 들어, 재수야!

translation.en: You may be used to bullying people and having them kiss your ass,
translation.ko: 남들 괴롭히고 다니고 아첨받는 데 익숙한가 본데

translation.en: but no one talks down to me.
translation.ko: 아무도 나한테 그딴 식으로 말 못 하니까

translation.en: So get back in your carriage and piss off to wherever you came from.
translation.ko: 다시 마차나 타고 왔던 곳으로 꺼지라고

translation.en: Go on, off you pop!
[Billy] Yeah!
[Spike] Posh prick.
[Bea] Shh, it's okay.
She's been having these dreams for two weeks now.
translation.ko: 걔 벌써 2주째 그런 꿈을 꾸고 있어요

translation.en: You said ages ago that dreams is how it started with my mum.
translation.ko: 우리 엄마도 꿈을 꾸면서 증상이 시작됐다고 하셨죠?

translation.en: I remember you telling me.
-You said towards the end that-- -[Sister Anna] Bea.
What happened to your mum isn't gonna happen to Jessie.
translation.ko: 제시가 엄마처럼 될 일은 없을 거야

translation.en: You're making connections that aren't there.
Why is her grave the only one that never has any flowers on it?
translation.ko: 왜 엄마 무덤에만 늘 꽃이 없죠?

translation.en: Guess no one else loved her apart from me and Jessie.
translation.ko: 저랑 제시 말고는 사랑한 사람이 없나 봐요

translation.en: I'm sure that isn't true.
What would you say if I stole some flowers off another grave and put 'em on my mum's?
translation.ko: 다른 무덤에서 꽃을 훔쳐다 여기 놔두면 뭐라고 하실래요?

translation.en: I'd say congratulations.
You're officially going to hell.
My door is always open.
What am I gonna do, Mum?
Sister?
There's no need to be afraid.
I'm a doctor.
Come any closer and you'll need a doctor.
translation.ko: 더 가까이 오면 그쪽이야말로 의사 신세 질걸

translation.en: My business partner and I
have been watching you from our apartment on Baker Street.
translation.ko: 베이커가의 우리 집에서 널 지켜봐 왔지

translation.en: We want something from you.
I have money.
I need a room.
Tell Hudson to put it on my tab.
Take a seat.
What happens in this room will remain between us.
translation.ko: 여기서 생긴 일은 아무한테도 말하면 안 돼

translation.en: Is that understood?
My business partner and I run a small detective agency.
translation.ko: 나와 내 동업자는 작은 탐정 사무소를 운영한다

translation.en: Our offices are here on Baker Street, 221B.
However…
we are reputable men,
and as such do not have access to the more
disreputable parts of London.
We need you to find information for us.
translation.ko: 그래서 네가 정보를 구해 와줬으면 해

translation.en: Should you be successful, you will receive generous compensation.
I'm listening.
And they say there's no such thing as miracles.
Four newborn babies have been stolen.
We have no idea whether they're living or dead.
The most recent was last night.
A baby in Bayswater was taken from a locked room.
translation.ko: 베이스워터에서 잠긴 방에 있던 아기가 사라졌어

translation.en: Windows locked from the inside.
Cot on one side of the room,
older sistersleeping in a bed on the other.
translation.ko: 다른 쪽엔 언니가 침대에서 자고 있었지

translation.en: Mother was awake downstairs during the disappearance.
translation.ko: 엄마는 실종 당시 아래층에 깨어 있었는데

translation.en: Confirmed no one left or entered the house.
translation.ko: 집에 들어오거나 나간 사람은 없었다고 했다

translation.en: We found this beneath the crib.
Why aren't the police doing anything?
Since the disappearance, the daughter hasn't returned home.
translation.ko: 아기가 실종된 후 큰딸이 집에 오지 않고 있어

translation.en: Something is amiss.
However, as I said,
locating errant teenagers is not something we have time for.
translation.ko: 가출한 10대를 찾는 건 우리가 할 일이 아니라서

translation.en: That's where you and your friends come in.
The daughter's name is Susan Shipley. Repeat it back to me.
translation.ko: 딸의 이름은 수전 시플리다 이름이 뭐라고?

translation.en: Susan Shipley.
If you want the money…
you find her and you find out what she knows.
translation.ko: 그 애를 찾아서 뭘 아는지 알아내

translation.en: [Billy] This is a stupid idea.
A man follows you from a graveyard and asks you to help find someone
translation.ko: 묘지에서 뒤따라온 남자가 납치에 관련된 사람을

translation.en: involved in a kidnapping?
-They're private detectives. -That's what he told you.
For all we know, this girl saw him take the baby.
Now he wants to do her in.
We have to find her and ask what she knows.
translation.ko: 그냥 걜 찾아서 뭘 아는지 물어보면 돼

translation.en: -That's it. Easy money. -Is it?
'Cause last I checked, there's four million people in London.
-It's like looking for a-- -Found her!
She's staying above a cobblers on Brookwater Street in Clerkenwell.
translation.ko: 클러켄월 브룩워터가의 신발 가게 위층에 머문대

translation.en: How did you find her?
You know Pete McGregor, the fishing wire guy?
translation.ko: 피트 맥그레거 알지? 낚싯줄 파는 사람

translation.en: Owed me a favor from the time I found his dog on Clapham Common.
translation.ko: 전에 내가 클래팜 코먼에서 그 사람 개를 찾아줬었거든

translation.en: He used to live in Bayswater, so I said…
translation.ko: 그 사람이 베이스워터에 산 적 있어서 물어봤지

translation.en: -Do you know Susan Shipley? -He said, "Nah, mate."
"The only person I know down in Bayswater is me Auntie Aggie."
[Billy] You didn't find Pete McGregor's dog.
You stole it when you were trying to impress that girl who loved animals.
translation.ko: 애초에 네가 훔쳤잖아 동물 좋아하는 여자애 꼬시려고

translation.en: Look, the important thing is he got his dog back. All right?
translation.ko: 어쨌든 그 사람한테 개를 돌려줬으니까 됐지

translation.en: Anyway. Auntie Aggie's house, it smells like piss and biscuits.
translation.ko: 암튼, 애기 이모 집은 오줌과 비스킷 냄새가 진동했는데

translation.en: Two hours she had me in there, waffling on.
Then this big fella comes in who she said was the gardener.
translation.ko: 근데 그때 소위 정원사라는 덩치 큰 남자가 들어왔지

translation.en: -But they was definitely banging. -Spike!
I'm gonna need you to get to the point now, mate.
Yeah. So…
[high-pitched voice] "He's looking for a girlcalled Susan Shipley."
[deep voice] "The girl Luke Porter is courting?"
[in normal voice] And they told me Luke Porter is a member of Salaman's Bathhouse in Shoreditch.
translation.ko: 루크 포터가 쇼어디치의 샐러맨즈 목욕탕 회원이래서

translation.en: To flush him out, I went into the changing rooms, loud, like…
translation.ko: 거기로 찾으러 갔지 끌어내려고 이렇게 외쳤어

translation.en: Yeah, mate!
I'm sleeping with a bird from down here. She's gorgeous.
translation.ko: 이 동네 여자애랑 자고 있어 완전 예쁘다니까

translation.en: Susan Shipley her name is.
He comes out of the shower and he's completely naked.
translation.ko: 샤워실에서 나와 홀딱 벗은 채로 달려들더라

translation.en: His wand is flapping all over the shop.
It's very unbecoming.
Mate.
Calm your horses. I was looking for Sue. She could be in trouble.
translation.ko: 진정해, 수전을 찾고 있어 곤란한 일이 생겼을지도 몰라

translation.en: Yeah? [Spike] "She don't want to be found, you slag."
translation.ko: '그래? 걘 자기 위치 알리기 싫대, 등신아'

translation.en: Have you ever heard of Edna Skiffins?
Edna Skiffins got ten years in prison for obstructing an investigation.
translation.ko: 수사를 방해한 죄로 10년이나 징역 산 사람

translation.en: Do you want to end up like Edna Skiffins?
Who in the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth is Edna Skiffins?
translation.ko: 에드나 스키핀스는 또 어디서 굴러먹던 사람이야?

translation.en: I made her up, didn't I?
-And it worked? -Yeah.
Is any of this true?
My friends, you're looking at one Miss Susan Shipley of Bayswater.
translation.ko: 친구들, 소개하지 베이스워터의 수전 시플리 씨야

translation.en: I don't have to talk to you. You're not police.
translation.ko: 말할 의무 없잖아 너희가 경찰도 아니고

translation.en: No, we're not.
The police aren't looking for your sister anymore.
translation.ko: 경찰은 이제 네 동생 안 찾아

translation.en: I guess they don't care enough about families like yours.
translation.ko: 너희 가족 같은 사람들한텐 신경 쓰기 아깝나 봐

translation.en: You're lying.
Of course they're looking for her.
No one's looking for her apart from the guys who asked us to talk to you.
translation.ko: 우리한테 너랑 얘기하라고 시킨 사람 외엔 없어

translation.en: Help them find her, Susan.
Tell us what you know.
That night…
the night Laura went missing…
I snuck out and left the window open.
I wasn't thinking.
When I got back…
Laura was gone.
I closed the window because I knew Mom would be so mad.
It wasn't your fault, Sue.
Well, she didn't disappear into thin air. She was taken out of the window.
translation.ko: 연기처럼 사라진 게 아니라 창문을 통해 납치된 거였네

translation.en: What, three floors up?
Can't even get that high with a ladder.
There is something else.
I thought I might have dreamt it, but for like…
five nights in a row, I heard this…
scraping and cawing outside the window.
translation.ko: 밖에서 까마귀 소리랑 창을 긁는 소리가 들렸어

translation.en: It sounded like…
[Bea] Like what?
Jesus Christ!
-What the hell was that? -[cawing]
-[Bea] Are you all right? -[Susan] I'm okay.
-[cawing] -It's coming back. Run. Run!
Quick!
-[Billy] It's jammed! -[Bea] Billy, come on!
[Bea] Got it.
Are you all right, Bumble?
[Spike] Bea?
Billy?
I'm so glad I found you.
Ever since I saw you the other day,
I haven't stopped…
well…
thinking about you.
And what exactly have you been thinking about?
Why don't you let me show you?
I knew an excursion would leave you tired out, sir.
But in many ways I am glad we left the palace.
translation.ko: 그래도 그 덕에 배운 게 있으실 테죠

translation.en: You saw the type of people out there.
I did indeed. [exhales]
You do understand, Your Majesty,
that I don't keep you here because I take any pleasure from it.
translation.ko: 제가 저 편하려고 외출을 막는 게 아닙니다

translation.en: I do it because you have hemophilia.
If you hurt yourself, it could have extremely dire consequences.
translation.ko: 다치기라도 하시면 심각한 일이 될 수 있으니까요

translation.en: I'm not to be disturbed for a while.
Under any circumstances.
Good afternoon to you, sir.
This is a fine establishment you have here.
But I'm actually looking for another pub, The Duck and Quiver?
translation.ko: 실은 다른 펍을 찾고 있는데 '덕 앤드 퀴버'라고 아십니까?

translation.en: But while I'm here, one pint of ale, please.
translation.ko: 잠깐 있을 테니 에일 한 잔 부탁합니다

translation.en: Is this sufficient payment?
Yeah, yeah.
That's the exact amount, mate.
You look like you could use a little assistance, young man.
translation.ko: 도움이 필요한 것 같아 보이네, 젊은이?

translation.en: [chuckling] Yes, as a matter of fact, I really, really could.
You see, I'm new to the city.
-Gosh. -Ha'penny just to watch.
Tuppence if you want me to relieve you.
I'm afraid there's been some sort of dreadful misunderstanding.
Welcome to London!
What do you want? Did the girl talk?
translation.ko: 왜 왔어? 그 여자애가 뭐 좀 말하던?

translation.en: What the hell have you got us involved in?
Her eyes were ripped out of her head by birds.
Calm down.
Did the girl tell you anything before she died?
translation.ko: 그 여자애가 죽기 전에 말한 게 있나?

translation.en: Her name was Susan.
You don't care, do you?
Not about Susan, not about the babies.
You just care about solving the case
and getting your commission from the police.
It doesn't matter anyway. We're out.
We did what you asked us to.
Oh, you expect to be paid?
For what, exactly?
You need to pay me.
Pay me, or by God, I will come back
and smash every window in this shithole you call a home.
translation.ko: 이 거지 같은 집 창문이란 창문은 다 깨버릴 거야

translation.en: And you accuse me of being in it for the money.
translation.ko: 그러면서 나보고 돈만 생각한다고 뭐라 해?

translation.en: A girl is dead and four babies are missing.
Now, you find me information, useful information,
and you will get your 30 pieces of silver.
Or do your friends and sister not need money?
Good. Now you stay there.
Do not move from that spot.
Now, the police, they have given us this.
It's the information for the other missing babies.
Why us?
-Why'd you pick us to help? -You're from the street.
translation.ko: - 왜 하필 우릴 골랐어요? - 거리에서 사니까

translation.en: "We're from the street." Yeah, I heard you last time.
I know bollocks when I hear it.
[Jessie] You knew itmade monsters out of people. [Alice] …hole in the side of the universe.
translation.ko: - 그게 사람을 괴물로 만들었어 - 우주의 구멍…

translation.en: [Dr. Watson] Something has come to London. A darkness has entered this city.
translation.ko: 런던에 뭔가가 왔어 이 도시에 어둠이 들어왔다

translation.en: [Bea] What you doing out here, Jess?
[Jessie] I don't like being stuck in the cellar.
Like you said, they're just bad dreams, right?
translation.ko: 언니 말대로 그건 그냥 꿈일 뿐이잖아?

translation.en: I know it's boring, but why don't you put your feet up--
translation.ko: 지겨운 건 아는데 그래도 좀 쉬는 게…

translation.en: I just told you why. Stop telling me what to do.
Can I help you with something?
Nice feather.
It's a raven's feather, right?
How'd you know it was a raven's feather?
Well, um, if you turn it in the light,
you'll see it has a blue iridescent hue to it.
translation.ko: 파란빛을 띄면서 각도에 따라 색이 바뀌거든

translation.en: Others of the Corvus family like crows tend to have a more verdant sheen.
translation.ko: 까마귀속 다른 새들은 좀 더 녹색에 가까운 광택이 나

translation.en: May I ask where you acquired it?
I found it. In the street.
Without wishing to cause any offense,
I find the chances of that extremely unlikely.
And, pray tell, why do you think that?
translation.ko: 그럼 설명해 봐 왜 그렇게 생각해?

translation.en: Well, Corvus corax are mainly found to the north and west of England.
translation.ko: 큰까마귀종은 주로 잉글랜드 북부와 서부에 살거든

translation.en: And Scotland.
It's highly unlikely there are any wild unkindnesses here in London.
translation.ko: 야생 '불친절'이 런던에 있을 확률은 극도로 낮아

translation.en: "Unkindness" is the collective noun.
-A collective noun is-- -I know what a collective noun is.
Of course. Sorry.
My name's Leop…
Just Leo.
Well, "Just Leo," you know a disturbing amount about birds.
translation.ko: 알았어, '그냥 리오' 새를 무서울 정도로 잘 아네

translation.en: I read a lot of books.
I mean, it's all I do, really.
What are you reading?
We, uh…
I don't know.
I don't know actually what I'm reading.
-Sounds intriguing. -Yeah, well, it's certainly that.
My friends and I are involved in an investigation.
What kind of investigation?
Four babies have gone missing.
Gosh.
That's awful.
May I?
Well, I'm not sure I'd be much use,
but perhaps another perspective could help?
-Interesting. -Yeah.
All four babies are female, all taken on consecutive dates.
translation.ko: 넷 다 여자애들이고 연이은 날짜에 납치됐어

translation.en: Interesting.
The most striking thing is they all appear to be born on the same day. [Bea] Mmm.
translation.ko: 가장 놀라운 건 모두 같은 날 태어났단 거야

translation.en: Further, given the addresses, they were probably all born at the same hospital.
translation.ko: 게다가 주소를 보니까 다 같은 병원에서 태어났겠는데

translation.en: The St. Mary's, near Paddington.
If you're able to find the other babies born on that day, in that hospital,
translation.ko: 그날 그 병원에서 태어난 다른 아기를 찾을 수 있다면

translation.en: you might be able to stop it from happening again.
translation.ko: 같은 일이 생기는 걸 막을 수 있을지도 몰라

translation.en: Marylebone Town Hall keep all the birth certificates of that parish.
translation.ko: 메릴본 주민 사무소에서 교구민 출생 증명서를 보관해

translation.en: It's just around the corner on Gloucester Place.
I… Was that of any help at all?
I could escort you to the Town Hall, if you'd like.
translation.ko: 괜찮으면 주민 사무소까지 안내해 줄 수도 있는데

translation.en: What are you?
Sorry?
How do you mean?
-Who is he? -[Bea] Hmm?
Who?
Oh, Leo.
Just some lad.
He said he works for his uncle near Kings Cross.
translation.ko: 킹스 크로스 근처에서 삼촌 일을 돕는대

translation.en: -Does deliveries for him. -[Jessie] I like him.
translation.ko: - 배달 같은 거 하면서 - 맘에 들어

translation.en: He's tasty.
Oh, I don't.
-Yeah, but you hate posh people. -I don't hate posh people.
translation.ko: - 넌 상류층 싫어하니까 - 싫어하는 거 아니야

translation.en: You're like a racist against posh people.
It's not posh people's fault they're posh. Like it's not our fault we're common.
translation.ko: 상류층 된 게 쟤 탓이야? 우리가 서민인 것도 마찬가진데

translation.en: [whispers] I don't hate posh people.
Yeah, keep repeating that. It makes it loads more believable.
translation.ko: 그래, 계속 말해라 점점 더 그럴싸하네

translation.en: Who cares who he is?
He's smart.
Very smart.
And if he can help us with the case, then I don't care what his story is.
Can I help you?
Madame, have you ever heard of a woman named Edna Skiffins? Ugh!
translation.ko: 부인, 에드나 스키핀스라는 여자에 관해 들어보셨나요?

translation.en: Edna Skiffins. Where to start…
Chaps!
Chaps! Chaps.
I found the birth register for St. Mary's.
translation.ko: 세인트메리스 병원 출생 신고 기록을 찾았어

translation.en: Six girls were born there on the 2nd of October.
Four have already gone missing and one passed away after it was born.
translation.ko: 그중 넷이 실종됐고 한 명은 태어난 직후에 죽었어

translation.en: The last one lives at 18 Persimmon Mews.
translation.ko: 마지막 한 명은 퍼시먼 뮤스 18번지에 살아

translation.en: Then that's where we need to go.
Beatrice…
there is something I feel I need to say.
I have to put forward the thesis that it's unlikely
translation.ko: 내 생각에 이 사건은 자연적 현상일 가능성이

translation.en: this is a natural phenomenon.
I think there's human design at play here.
What's he saying, Bea?
He's saying that someone's controlling the birds.
[Spike] Guys.
I ain't coming.
Think about what you're doing. A girl is dead.
translation.ko: 지금 뭘 하는 건지 생각해 봐 여자애가 죽었어

translation.en: Not just dead.
Her frigging eyes were pulled out of her face!
And you wanna go play at being cops?
If you had a brain cell between you, you'd walk away.
That's fine.
Jessie, go back to the cellar with him.
What? No, I'm coming with you. I want to help.
translation.ko: 뭐? 싫어, 같이 갈래 나도 돕고 싶단 말이야

translation.en: No, you're not. Go and put your feet up for a bit.
translation.ko: 그건 안 돼, 가서 좀 쉬고 있어

translation.en: You can't keep me cooped up all day
'cause you're worried something might happen to me.
translation.ko: 온종일 지하실에 처박아 둘 생각은 마

translation.en: Tell her, Billy.
She's right, Jess.
-Tonight could be dangerous. -We're not asking you, we're telling you.
translation.ko: - 오늘은 위험할 수도 있어 - 이건 부탁이 아니라 명령이야

translation.en: You're telling me?
You're not my mum, Bea. Why can't I come?
translation.ko: 언니가 내 엄마야? 왜 나는 가면 안 돼?

translation.en: -[Bea] Because-- -Because what?
Because you're a mess, Jessie! Because you're falling to pieces.
translation.ko: 넌 정상이 아니니까, 제시! 점점 상태가 나빠지고 있잖아

translation.en: And… and yes.
I'm worried about you.
We're all worried about you.
You walked in front of a horse, Jessie.
You're lucky to be alive.
I don't want you getting hurt. I…
I can't risk it.
I can't risk losing you as well.
You think I'm crazy like Mum.
You all do.
I'm just a burden to you all, aren't I?
Just someone you have to look after.
Jessie.
No… No!
Jess. Jess!
Look, no one is saying you're crazy. No one is saying that.
translation.ko: 아무도 네가 미쳤다고 생각 안 해 안 그런다고

translation.en: All right? Everyone's just freaking out…
[Bea] This is it. 18 Persimmon Mews.
The baby's gonna be asleep.
So, just switch it for the decoy and get out of there.
Is this supposed to look like a baby?
We've got limited resources.
-It's moronic. -It's fine.
No, no, no, no.
You're supposed to be asleep.
Okay.
Uh, look…
I'm gonna have to pick you up.
-Please, stop crying. -[crying continues]
[woman] Shush, sweetheart! Mommy's coming! Coming!
[woman] I can't… I can't open the door!
[woman] Dave, come up here!
[woman] Dave, I can't get in there!
[Billy] No, no, no, no.
[Bea] It's got her!
It's just a dream. It's just a dream. It can't hurt me.
translation.ko: 이건 그냥 꿈이야, 날 해치지 못해

translation.en: Jessie?
-[choking] -Jessie!
It's him.
Hand over the baby now or I'll beat the crap out of you.
This is my baby.
She's mine!
[Spike] No.
-[choking] -No, no, no.
Jessie! Wake up!
-[choking] -Jessie, please breathe.
Hi.
-It's okay, it's okay, it's okay! -[panting]
I'm not a murderer or anything like that.
I know this is extremely weird,
but I promise you, you are safe here.
And I promise you, I'm not a murderer.
-Repeat, not a murderer. -Stop saying that!
translation.ko: - 진짜로, 나 살인자 아니야 - 그 말 좀 그만해요!

translation.en: Okay.
Where am I?
Well, technically, you're not really here, just your mind is.
translation.ko: 엄밀히 말해, 넌 여기 없고 네 마음만 여기 와 있는 거야

translation.en: Where am I?
You're in Louisiana.
-Why did he think the baby was his? -'Cause he's crazy.
No, it's too easy just to think that people are crazy.
translation.ko: 그냥 다 미쳤다고 생각해 버리면 안 돼

translation.en: We're missing something that…
He lost his baby.
He lost his little girl.
He's looking for her. He won't stop until he finds her.
translation.ko: 걔를 찾고 있어 찾기 전까진 안 멈출 거야

translation.en: Until he…
The sixth baby.
The one that passed the day it was born. Show me the details.
translation.ko: 태어난 날 죽었던 아기 말이야 걔 자료 좀 보여줘

translation.en: Lenore Hilton. Mother is Angela Hilton. Occupation: laborer.
translation.ko: 르노어 힐턴, 엄마는 앤절라 힐턴 직업은 노동자

translation.en: Father is Arthur Hilton. Occupation…
Head Ornithologist, London Zoo.
Got the bastard.
I swear, I'm your friend.
And right now, correct me if I'm wrong,
you need all the friends you can get.
Where were you just now?
Before I brought you here?
-I was in a nightmare. -Mmm-hmm.
[shakily] I have these nightmares where I get trapped in these tunnels in hell.
translation.ko: 지옥의 동굴 같은 곳에 갇혀 있는 악몽을 자주 꿔요

translation.en: And there was this thing, this dark thing with a mask and…
translation.ko: 거기서 가면을 쓴 시커먼 게 자꾸 나타나서…

translation.en: I can't hold you here much longer. We don't have much time.
translation.ko: 오래 붙잡아 둘 순 없겠다 시간이 별로 없어

translation.en: Your friends seek a man who can control the birds, right?
translation.ko: 친구들이 새를 조종할 수 있는 남자를 찾고 있지?

translation.en: He's a man of the living world, a normal man.
translation.ko: 그자는 산 자의 세계에 사는 평범한 남자야

translation.en: This man has obtained great powers,
and I need you to find out for me where he got those powers from.
translation.ko: 그자가 어디서 그런 힘을 얻었는지 알아내서 가르쳐다오

translation.en: Can you do that for me, Jessica?
How?
If you touch him on the arm, like this…
you will enter his mind.
[Jessie] No!
I… I can't.
You are awakening.
-Just like I did. -I don't want this.
If you want these nightmares to stop, then you must remember,
what you thought was madness…
is power.
We need to find the others.
[Leopold] Here it is.
The largest aviary in Europe.
Vulture, the ravens, I knew they had to come from somewhere.
translation.ko: 독수리, 큰까마귀는 이런 곳 아니면 찾기 힘들어

translation.en: This is him.
It has to be him.
Where are the birds?
Out stealing babies?
You've come for my babies.
You shouldn't have.
And now I'm gonna have to hurt you.
You're trying to stop me finding my baby.
translation.ko: 아기를 찾지 못하게 날 방해하려고 하니까

translation.en: Your baby's dead, Arthur.
She died at the hospital, the day she was born.
No.
Someone took her and they swapped her!
translation.ko: 누가 걜 데려가고 바꿔치기해 놓은 거야

translation.en: What's he doing?
I've been too subtle in my method.
Why not all the birds in London?
Why not all the birds in England?
Close the doors!
I will find her if I have to take every baby in London!
translation.ko: 내 아기를 찾을 거다 런던의 모든 아기를 데려와서라도!

translation.en: Jess!
Go!
-I have to go over to him, Bea. -What do you mean? Why?
translation.ko: - 저 남자한테 가야 해 - 그게 무슨 소리야? 왜?

translation.en: I don't have time to explain. I have to touch him.
translation.ko: 설명할 시간 없어 저 남자를 만져야 해

translation.en: -What? No! -Please, Bea.
For once, you have to trust me.
[Bea] Jess!
What's going on?
Where are we?
We're in your memories, Arthur.
The day your daughter passed.
No.
She's not dead.
Someone took her.
Look.
Where's the baby?
My little girl, I want to see her.
I'm afraid that's not possible.
We already took the body down to the morgue.
-She's my baby! I want to see her! -No.
It was too painful for you to remember, so you made yourself forget.
translation.ko: 너무 고통스러운 기억이라 머릿속에서 지워버린 거예요

translation.en: I just wanted to say goodbye.
They should have let you.
I'm so sorry.
Arthur, I need to see how you got your powers.
translation.ko: 아서가 그 힘을 어떻게 얻었는지 봐야겠어요

translation.en: [Arthur] Angie?
You here, my love?
I need help.
I need help finding our baby.
[The Bird Master] I never believed it would really work.
translation.ko: 정말로 될 거라곤 생각 안 했어

translation.en: I just needed to do something.
And something did happen.
I could feel a power building.
I could feel myself changing.
I could feel it coursing through me.
translation.ko: 그 힘이 내 몸속을 흐르는 게 느껴졌지

translation.en: Where did it come from?
I don't know.
I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
Hiya, beautiful.
Jessie…
what did you do?
Can we go home now?
Leo?
No sign of posh boy then, I take it?
Or do your friends and sister not need money?
[Billy] Bumble?
Open the door!
I know you're in!
[Dr. Watson] No, I won't let you… I won't let you do this again!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 그만둬 또 그러게 놔둘 순 없어

translation.en: -[glass crashes] -Stop! [grunts]
[grunts] Don't come back, then!
Goddamn you, don't you ever come back here! [breathing heavily]
translation.ko: 빌어먹을 자식! 다신 돌아올 생각 마!

translation.en: How did you get in here?
The door was open.
I suppose you came for your money.
You'll be pleased to hear
all the babies were returned to their homes.
Arthur Hilton will spend the rest of his days in Bedlam.
translation.ko: 아서 힐턴은 남은 생을 베들럼 정신병원에서 보낼 거야

translation.en: He's lucky the British legal system isn't au fait with the supernatural.
translation.ko: 영국 법체계가 초자연 현상에 그다지 정통하지 않은 덕분이지

translation.en: He'd be swinging from a noose.
How did you know the girl that I hang around with is my sister?
translation.ko: 나랑 있던 여자애가 내 동생인 건 어떻게 알았죠?

translation.en: Tell me,
or you'll never see any of us again.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 다신 우릴 못 볼 거예요

translation.en: And I think you need us. I think you need my sister.
translation.ko: 우리가 필요하잖아요 내 동생이 필요한 거잖아요

translation.en: Your sister has a gift.
She can see things normal people cannot.
translation.ko: 보통 사람은 못 보는 걸 보지

translation.en: How did you know she was gifted?
When you've spent a lifetime fighting demons,
you get to learn how to spot an angel.
Is everything all right?
Yeah. Just getting our money.
[Dr. Watson] Something has come to London, girl.
A darkness has entered this city.
You think you've known horror these last few days?
translation.ko: 요 며칠 간의 일로 공포가 뭔지 안 것 같아?

translation.en: You know nothing of what it is to be afraid.
translation.ko: 넌 전혀 몰라 진짜 무서운 게 뭔지

translation.en: Don't go far.
This is just the beginning.
